amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting the designation of critical habitat.

vote.text: Amendment SA 659 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 128.

action.text: Amendment SA 659 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cotton. (consideration: CR S1995-1997, S2009-2010; text: CR S1996) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting the designation of critical habitat.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 659 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 128.
